Package controllerGui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChooseRegionPopUpController
    This class is responsible for providing the functionality for the choose region pop-up window in the GUI.
    ClientsReportController
    This class is responsible for providing the functionality for the clients report screen in the GUI.
    ConfirmOnlineOrderController
    Confirm online order screen, implements Screen interface
    CreateNewSaleController
    create new sale GUI controller, , implements Screen interface
    DeliveryManagementController
    Delivery Management GUI controller, implements Screen interface Handler for all Boundary
    EKTPopupController
    EKT popup controller, implements Screen interface Controls the quick login for members only
    HomePageController
    Home page GUI controller, implements Screen interface Home page for ALL system users, which changes according to user role
    HostClientController
    Host Client GUI controller, implements Screen interface Handler for first screen of client-server connection
    LoginController
    Login GUI controller, implements Screen interface Handle the login boundary, validation, process and navigation
    LoginControllerTest  
    OrdersReportController
    Order report GUI controller, implements Screen interface Getting the report and showing it to user
    PaymentPopupController
    Payment GUI controller, implements Screen interface Simulate the external popup.
    PersonalMessagesController
    Personal messages area GUI controller, implements Screen interface Getting and showing user's messages from all times.
    PopupController
    Popup GUI controller, implements Screen interface Controls the popup text, image and buttons according to parameters; Generic controller for most popup messages from server
    RegistrationFormController
    Registration GUI controller, implements Screen interface Customer service worker use this screen to get user information and sign in him
    ReportSelectionController
    Controller for the Orders Report screen.
    ReviewOrderController
    Review Order GUI controller, implements Screen interface Shows the user's order summary, includes first time purchase discounts and navigates to payment.
    SalesManagementController
    Sales Management GUI controller, implements Screen interface creates new sale pattern
    ServerConfigurationController
    The Class ServerConfigurationController.
    ShipmentMethodPopupController
    Shipment Method Popup GUI controller, implements Screen interface getting information about shipping method from user, and according to this showing the items etc
    SupplyManagementController
    Supply Management GUI controller, implements Screen interface and ICmbANDTableSetUp Getting and changing supply information.
    SupplyReportController
    Supply report GUI controller, implements Screen interface Getting the report and showing it to user
    SupplyReportControllerTest  
    SupplyUpdateController
    Supply Update implements Screen interface for a GUI used to update the supply of machines.
    UsersManagementController
    Users management GUI controller, implements Screen interface Can see all unapproved from users from customer service, and can approve them
    ViewCatalogController
    Controller class for the view catalog screen.
